q_en: Send 1000 Leathers to the Main Warehouse for storage.

steps.sql: UPDATE warehouse_material wm JOIN materials m ON wm.material_id = m.id JOIN warehouse w ON wm.warehouse_id = w.id SET wm.left_number = wm.left_number + 1000 WHERE m.name = 'Leather' AND w.name = 'Main Warehouse';
steps.description: Update the left_number of the Leather material in the Main Warehouse by adding 1000 to the current left_number.
